topic.title: Configuring a database for use with Mingle

section.title: Introduction and advice
section.p: Before you can install Mingle, you must install a database for Mingle to use. We highly recommended using PostgreSQL. Support for Oracle (10g or 11g) is also available but is limited to Mingle Plus only.
section.warning: In order that we can offer you the best support, you should never directly access the Mingle database. All integrations should be done using the supported APIs.

topic.subsection: After configuring the database, you can now install Mingle.
